backend/main.mo: Defines product, category, user, and order types with admin login/session handling and provides queries and mutations for browsing products and managing user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for all major frontend files, describing layout, hooks, components, pages, and cart logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template mounting the frontend app and loading the Vite entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring all public and admin routes with TanStack Router plus theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Admin gate component that checks admin session status and shows loading or access-denied states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog form for creating or editing products, handling all product fields, category selection, photo upload, and saving via hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductPho: Image uploader component handling validation, preview, upload progress, and removal using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Login/logout button for customers using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting users to submit name and email to create their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin layout with navigation, header, footer, session check, and logout logic, wrapping protected admin routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Public site layout with navigation, cart badge, mobile menu, and customer login, excluding admin routes.
frontend/src/components/products/AZFilte: Alphabet filter allowing selection or clearing of a starting letter for product filtering.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product display card with image, details, quantity selector, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/products/Quantit: Numeric quantity control with increment/decrement buttons and clamped manual input handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGate.ts: Provides an auth gate hook that triggers login when needed and runs a queued action after successful authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, orders, and user profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light/dark medical-themed UI design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page describing the company, mission, vision, and values.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Lists all categories and provides a dialog to add new ones using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin stats for products, categories, and pending orders with navigation links.
Handles admin authentication with session check, login form, and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Shows order details, customer info, and allows updating the order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with basic info and links to view detailed order pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages products with listing, add/edit dialog, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with item management, totals, and checkout navigation requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow, order submission, profile checks, and displays success or empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with basic validation and static business/contact info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays hero section and hot products, supports add-to-cart with auth and profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users their past orders and redirects unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and shows detailed product info with image, pricing, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products with Aâ€“Z filtering and add-to-cart logic including auth/profile validation.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store for cart items with persistence and methods to modify cart state.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin UI session state in localStorage by storing, retrieving, and clearing a timestamp value.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and loading several plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
